name: A Super Mom Rush - Busy Mommy Run and Jump Adventure
name_original: A Super Mom Rush - Busy Mommy Run and Jump Adventure
description:
All you shoppaholics out there! Have your cash ready because we'll be shopping nonstop!

Shopping is not a sickness, it's a therapy! So get those shoes on and be ready to shop all night long, because Super Mom is gonna take you to a whole new shopping experience! Want to shop more? Then collect those coins and earn big! You'll get your rewards at the end of the game.

Don't miss out the fun! Grab the game

Game Features:
> Shopping spree vibes
> Easy control and navigation
> Fun and amusing game for all
